title: Drawing, 1759–72
medium: Red chalk on off-white laid paper
description: Drawing of a young man facing front, standing with left leg extended, head turned back over the left shoulder. His right arm is shown reaching across his chest to the left and the left arm is reaching back to pluck arrows from a quiver on his back. A vase stands at the figure's side.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1759–72.
1759–72. Red chalk on off-white laid paper. Gift of Noah Butkin. 1977-110-2-13.
